msg.author: Daenerys Targaryen
msg.title: Game of Thrones
msg.content: Hi, Jon! I'm waiting for you in the west.

msg.author: Daenerys Targaryen
msg.title: Queen
msg.content: I know that I will be the next queen by my own way.

msg.author: Daenerys Targaryen
msg.title: My wish
msg.content: Soon I will be the queen of the Seven Kingdoms
